message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
